message.body: Hey Kelsey, Gabi here. Do you know the writer, Etgar Keret?/want to come here him speak tonight?
Hey, that sounds great. Can I let you know in a couple of hours? Where is it?
It's at the Gershman Y (broad and pine) at 7. Theres a film about him and then he'll speak. If you dont know his writing, theyre really short stories, so you should check out one or two ahead of time
Hey! Thanks so much for your patience. I can go! What time and where do you want to meet?
Great! I'm gonna be running around like a loon until the movie so lets meet just before 7 at the venue
Hey I'm on the NE corner of broad and pine. WHere do I go from here?
